comments:
Hi Eclipse people

Sun JDK 1.4.1_01

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 f?vr. 27, 2003 10:21:03.640
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException	at

A copy/paste typo - used wrong widget that is null in this particular context. 
Fixed.
